item.title: [Delta] Zombie Head Help. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

[quote=“neil1111, post:2, topic:366680”]i think you need to take out the player weapon part, and make the case the same as the item id. not sure though because i didnt do delta.case 6722: setAnimation(2844); plrText = "Muahahahah!"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; break; }

case 6723: setAnimation(2840); plrText = "ALAS!"; plrTextUpdateRequired = true; break; }

as i said though im not 100% sure if this is how its done.[/quote]

well that wont work

item.title: [Delta] Zombie Head Help. [Delta]
item.dc:creator: @Pblord7 Pblord7
item.description:
@Pblord7 wrote:

I need help with my zombie head so when i click it it doesn’t have to be equiped it just does it, heres my code.

case 41:
			             if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==  6722) {
                setAnimation(2844);
                plrText = "Muahahahah!";
                plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
                break;
        }

and

case 122:
			       if(playerEquipment[playerWeapon] ==  6722) {
                setAnimation(2840);
                plrText = "ALAS!";
                plrTextUpdateRequired = true;
                break;
        }

Read full topic
